status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: I'm seeing this test failing in several recent PRs (Failed, not Flaky). It's marked as Flaky but I guess it's not passing even with retries.
Yeah, I think this is now completely broken. We should disable if we can't fix it asap.

I think the root cause may be that default "retry.backoff.ms" is 100L. If the case can't finish all assertion in 100L, a new fetchMetadata request will be sent. Since we don't set next pendingAuthenticationErrors, so the mockClient will keep waiting for the metadata response. Finally, the case will fail. I will create a PR to set "retry.backoff.ms" in the case to avoid the error.
